skill.name: java-maven-helper
skill.description: Maven build system, dependency management, and Java project configuration assistance.
skill.summary: Maven build system, dependency management, and Java project configuration assistance.
skill.author: CuriousLearner

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown documentation and guidance. No executable code, no file system access, no network calls, and no external command execution. This is a documentation-only skill providing Maven expertise through AI interaction.

content.value_statement: Managing Maven projects and dependencies can be complex and error-prone. This skill provides expert guidance for initializing projects, resolving dependency conflicts, configuring builds, and troubleshooting common Maven issues.
actual_capabilities: Add, update, and manage dependencies in pom.xml
Resolve dependency conflicts and version issues
Troubleshoot build failures and repository errors
limitations: Does not execute Maven commands on your system
Cannot access your local Maven repository or project files
Provides guidance only, no direct code generation for your project
Cannot install or update Maven itself

use_cases.title: Set Up New Maven Projects
use_cases.description: Initialize Java projects with proper Maven structure, configure pom.xml with dependencies and plugins

use_cases.title: Configure Complex Builds
use_cases.description: Set up multi-module builds, configure profiles for different environments, and optimize build performance

use_cases.title: Troubleshoot Build Issues
use_cases.description: Diagnose dependency resolution errors, fix version conflicts, and resolve repository access problems

prompt_templates.title: Initialize Project
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me create a new Maven project with archetype. I need to initialize a Java project with groupId com.mycompany and artifactId myapp.

prompt_templates.title: Add Dependency
prompt_templates.prompt: How do I add Spring Boot starter dependency to my pom.xml? I want to use version 3.2.0 and include web and test starters.

prompt_templates.title: Fix Conflicts
prompt_templates.prompt: My Maven build is failing due to dependency conflicts. How can I analyze and fix version conflicts between transitive dependencies?

prompt_templates.title: Configure CI/CD
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a GitHub Actions workflow for my Maven project that runs tests, generates JaCoCo coverage reports, and uploads to Codecov.

output_examples.input: Help me add the JUnit 5 dependency to my Maven project
output: Add this to your pom.xml dependencies section:
Also add the maven-surefire-plugin version 3.2.2 to your build plugins for test execution.

best_practices: Use dependencyManagement section in parent POMs to centralize version management
Configure Maven Wrapper (mvnw) for consistent builds across team members
Set explicit Java compiler source and target versions in properties
anti_patterns: Avoid hardcoding dependency versions directly in dependency declarations when using BOMs
Do not skip tests in production builds without proper CI validation
Avoid using snapshot dependencies in production artifacts

faq.question: What Java versions does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill covers Java 8 through Java 17+ configurations, including compiler plugin settings and compatible dependency versions.

faq.question: Can this skill execute Maven commands for me?
faq.answer: No. This skill provides guidance and examples only. You must run Maven commands yourself using mvnw or your local Maven installation.

faq.question: Does this skill access my local Maven repository?
faq.answer: No. The skill cannot read or modify your local ~/.m2/repository or any project files. All interaction is through AI conversation.

faq.question: Can I use this skill for multi-module projects?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill includes comprehensive guidance on setting up parent-child POM relationships and managing shared dependencies.

faq.question: What build troubleshooting does this skill cover?
faq.answer: Dependency resolution failures, version conflicts, corrupted local repositories, memory issues, and slow build optimization.

faq.question: How is this different from Maven documentation?
faq.answer: This skill provides conversational, context-aware guidance tailored to your specific build problems with practical solutions and examples.
